Class LabelCombobox

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreserveState, IViewControl, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class LabelCombobox
extends ViewControl

This class is a ViewControl (ActiveJPanel) consisting of a JLabel descriptor and a JComboBox.

See Also:
Serialized Form

setItemList

public void setItemList(java.lang.String[] items)
Use this method to reset the list of Strings displayed by the JComboBox. If null is passed, all of the items in the JComboBox will be removed.

Parameters:
items - The items displayed by the JComboBox.
